comment: I don't know for sure if its agreement with Google play but you really need to put adverts on a 5 minute app code? Please
title: I'll use it till I develop one myself lol

author: Mark Rodgers
comment: Programmed to run quickly, you don't have to wait watching rendered dice bouncing around. Would be good to be able to chance the colours though.

author: Rahul Dhiman
comment: When we play ludo we use this app against dice it's very good and easy to play
title: Good dice

author: Grant Martin
comment: Would be nice if I could lock in the value of some and re roll the others, like for Yahtzee.

author: Chris Chapman
comment: Adverts. Seriously. Does the job but no adverts please..

author: Elpidio de la Cruz
comment: Very useful for games
title: It's nice

comment: Liked it

I have to say there are similar apps that are ranked higher with more download - don't know why. But those are a complete zero in comparison with this one. I love the interface, so simple with nice colors and yellow background. I love the shake option and it would be more than perfect if there would be a option to make it 3D but for everthing else to stay the same, just 3D - it would be a nice touch. But anyway, great work. Had to scroll down a little bit to find this awesome app. It should be ranked number 1.
title: Thank You Nikola!

author: Pratik Palse
comment: Very handy... simple UGI... I'm an engineer and use this add randomness to things which are pretty straight forward...
title: Simple and useful

reply.author: Nikola Kosev

title: good app

author: Lars Rottweiler
comment: every couple rounds of dice there is an ad. this is annoying and makes the app unusable

reply.author: Nikola Kosev
reply.content: Dice App is free and requires ads for development and support. You can easily remove them with small one-time payment to Google from the settings menu.

author: Deor Phillips
comment: Wtf is the purpose of this would be game???? I cant believe im downloader number 101. Lalol.. to use for games that uses dices incase you lost them, that makes sense. Ill change my star rating up for responding with an answer that makes sense and also gives this app a purpose. But to be honest, i dont know many people that still play board games...

reply.author: Nikola Kosev
reply.content: It is not a game but a substitution for physical dice for your board games. We are sorry you don't like it.
